hf.name: Mr. Whiskers
hf.appearance: Large, fluffy white cat with blue eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: Sarah never expected her imaginary friend to become real, but sometimes reality has a way of surprising us.
json_to_edit.description: Sarah's imaginary cat, Mr. Whiskers, suddenly becomes real, causing chaos and wonder.
json_to_edit.name: Imaginary Friend Comes to Life
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Sarah's imaginary cat Mr. Whiskers becomes real, leading to a series of magical and chaotic events.

qa.action: Sarah's colorful bedroom, filled with drawings of her imaginary cat, Mr. Whiskers.

hf.action: Sarah drawing Mr. Whiskers in her sketchbook, talking to him as if he's there.

tr.action: The drawing of Mr. Whiskers begins to glow and move on the paper.

xc.action: Mr. Whiskers leaps out of the sketchbook, now a real cat, landing on Sarah's bed.

ka.action: Sarah's eyes widen in disbelief as she sees her imaginary friend come to life.

fn.action: Sarah's mom bursts into the room, freezing at the sight of the magical cat.

af.action: Mr. Whiskers playfully knocks items off shelves with his tail, causing chaos.

qo.action: Sarah giggling as she pets the now-real Mr. Whiskers, joy evident on her face.

fp.action: Dr. Fantasia arrives, looking amazed at the sight of the magical cat in Sarah's room.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Do not change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: Sarah never expected her imaginary friend to become real, but sometimes reality has a way of surprising us.
updated_json.description: Sarah's imaginary cat, Mr. Whiskers, suddenly becomes real, causing chaos and wonder.
updated_json.name: Imaginary Friend Comes to Life

yz.action: Mr. Whiskers demonstrates a magical ability, perhaps changing colors or floating slightly above the ground.

wx.action: The entire group - Sarah, her mom, Dr. Fantasia, and Mr. Whiskers - pose for a family photo, capturing this extraordinary moment.

label.rationale:
we will update the json according to the edit command. we'll add two new shots at the end of the scene and remove the first shot. here's what we'll do:

1. remove the first shot (key "qa") from the shots dictionary and the list_display_order.
2. add two new shots at the end of the scene with creative descriptions that fit the context.
3. update the list_display_order to reflect these changes.
4. update the number_of_shots from "9" to "10" to account for the net increase of one shot.

we won't change anything else in the scene to adhere to the command.

value.action: Mr. Whiskers demonstrates a magical ability, perhaps changing colors or floating slightly above the ground.
The entire group - Sarah, her mom, Dr. Fantasia, and Mr. Whiskers - pose for a family photo, capturing this extraordinary moment.
